  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server​(int num_players, int startingMoney, int bblind, int port, HThread master, java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger status) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Constructs a server that sends and receives game state update messages to and from the client
      Parameters:
      num_players - The max number of players
      startingMoney - The starting money every player gets
      bblind - The amount of money the big blind is
      port - The port the server is being hosted on
      master - The Thread which creates the server
      status - An integer that allows the user to start the game with any number of players less than 5 connected
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

  • Method Details

    • nextCmd

      public java.lang.String[] nextCmd​(int id) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Stalls the server until a message is received from a particular user
      Parameters:
      id - The user id
      Returns:
      An array of parsed strings representing the message form the user
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • executeCmd

      public int executeCmd​(java.lang.String process)
      Executes a command on the server
      Parameters:
      process - The command message
      Returns:
      0 if the message was a known operation otherwise it returns -1

    • sendCards

      public void sendCards​(java.util.ArrayList<PlayerTuple> queue)
      Sends cards to all active players
      Parameters:
      queue - The queue of people to recieve cards

    • forceFold

      public void forceFold​(int id)
      Sends a message to the clients that a person has folded
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the player who folded

    • sendPot

      public void sendPot​(int pot)
      Sends the current pot amount to all players
      Parameters:
      pot - The amount of money in the pot

    • sendMoney

      public void sendMoney​(int id, int money)

      Parameters:
      id - the id of the player in question
      money - the amount of money the player has
